patthana10.8:1.1: Nakusalaṃ noupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana10.8:2.1: Nakusalaṃ nanoupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana10.8:3.1: Nakusalaṃ nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana10.8:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nanokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
